section.title: "Activities" View

textobject.para: The Activities Main View, showing the existing Activities, and a button for query their liveness.

section.para: In this view, it's possible to monitor the existing activities in the SLEE. The Activity Contexts are listed by their ID, TTL (maximum time in seconds without being accessed) and their Java Class Name.

section.title: View Activities Details

textobject.para: The Activities Details View, showing the details of a selected activity.

section.para: In the Browse Activities tab the list of activities is shown. When clicking on one of the Activity Context ID, it's details are shown. The following details are displayed:

listitem.para: ID
The internal identifier for this Activity Context.
Activity Class
The Java class representing this activity.
Last Access Timestamp
The timestamp of when this Activity Context was last accessed.
Is Ending
Indicates whether activity is in pending state.
Timers
The SLEE Timers attached to this Activity Context, if any.
Data Attributes
The CMP attributes set in this Activity Context, if any.
Name Bindings
The set of names given to this Activity Context, if any.
RA Entity
The Resource Adaptor Entity responsible for creating this Activity Context, if any.
SBB Attachments
The SBBs attached to this Activity Context, if any.

section.para: It is also possible to view the details of the SBB Entities attached to the activities by clicking on it's ID.

textobject.para: The Activities SBB Entity Details View, showing the details of a selected SBB entity.

listitem.para: Entity ID
The internal identifier for this SBB Entity.
Parent SBB Entity
The internal identifier for the parent SBB Entity for this SBB Entity, if any.
Root SBB Entity
The internal identifier of the root SBB Entity for this SBB Entity, which may be itself.
SBB
The SBB component this SBB Entity represents.
Priority
The priority for this SBB Entity in it's child relation, if any.
Service Convergence Name
A name used to uniquely identify a root SBB entity belonging to a Service.
Service
The SLEE Service to which this SBB Entity belongs.

section.para: The Remove button allows to force the removal of this identity, useful for certain development and/or troubleshooting situations where entities may be leaking.

section.title: Query Activity Context Liveness
section.para: It is possible to query Resource Adaptor created activities for validity, by querying their liveness. If the Activity is not alive the Resource Adaptor is expected to end the activity. If the Activity is still alive the Resource Adaptor is not expected to do anything.
